name: Coming And Going
description:
Coming and Going is a game about the excitement of coming home to people you love, the realisation that even though the company gives you joy it is physically and mentally straining, and the relief of finally leaving.

Made for a brief called "Home", and based on our own views of what home really is. 

Developers

Rebecka Jansson @mercworm

Brynn Clayton @ItsNotBryan

Ben Walker @walkies3

Other credits available in the downloadable zip.
